meanings.definition: Lacking or not conforming to norms
meanings.sent1: The normless behavior of the child surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The classroom was quiet, a normless situation for that rowdy group.
meanings.sent3: The normless dance moves of the penguin made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her normless fashion sense was like a splash of color in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The normless sky during the eclipse was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The normless project left everyone confused about what to do next.
meanings.sent2: The normless road signs made it difficult to navigate the new town.
meanings.sent3: The normless recipe resulted in a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: His normless approach to painting created unique and captivating art.
meanings.sent5: The normless schedule caused chaos in the office.
